metadata.feature_description: Shows server information and system status in a hover-based summary panel.

steps.action: Navigated to website and logged in as SuperUser
steps.actual: Login successful, PersonaBar visible with evoq logo at top left

steps.expected: Server summary panel should appear after hoverIntent timeout (200ms)
steps.actual: Server summary panel appeared showing product info, server details, and links

steps.expected: Panel should display ProductName, ProductVersion, FrameworkVersion, ServerName, License, and support links
steps.actual: Panel displays: Evoq Engage (Product), v. 10.01.01 (85) (Version), 4.8 (.NET Framework), EC2AMAZ-2AKAC3I (Server Name), Trial (License Key), Documentation/Customer Portal/Contact Support links, and Logout option

steps.action: Moved mouse away from PersonaBar logo area to page content
steps.expected: Server summary panel should hide after hoverIntent timeout
steps.actual: Server summary panel dismissed and PersonaBar returned to normal state

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify all server metrics display correctly

steps.action: Hovered over PersonaBar logo again and verified all metrics programmatically
steps.expected: All server metrics from GetServerInfo API should be displayed
steps.actual: All metrics verified: Evoq Engage, v. 10.01.01 (85), 4.8 (.Net Framework), EC2AMAZ-2AKAC3I (Server Name), Trial (License Key), Documentation link (http://www.dnnsoftware.com/docs/), Customer Portal link, Contact Support link, Logout option

observations: The server summary feature uses hoverIntent jQuery plugin with 200ms timeout for better UX
Server information is fetched via API call to personaBar/evoq/GetServerInfo endpoint
The summary panel includes external links to DNN documentation, customer portal, and support resources

Some suggested test scenarios from the task were not tested as they fall outside STANDARD testing scope for Medium priority: 'Test summary refresh on hover', 'Check summary display on different screen sizes', and 'Test with server under high load'
